successes.title: HARBINGER DOWN : A Practical Creature FX Film
successes.description: A sci-fi/horror film by Creature FX Designer Alec Gillis, that will celebrate Animatronics and Makeup FX . Help keep FX real!

Pledges.description: For 5 dollars our wonderful cast and crew will personally thank all the folks in this category in a special video that we'll post on our youtube channel. Hopefully it's a long list! We'll do our best to alphabetize, so you can doze off until your name comes up!
SHOOTING SCRIPT PDF, A DIGITAL COPY OF ARTWORK, OUR PRODUCTION DIARY AND PRIVATE Behind the Scenes (BTS) Footage. Welcome aboard the SS Harbinger!
(ADD ON) DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF FINISHED FILM- Who needs all that other junk! This is the what it's all about!

DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF FINISHED FILM AND 8.5" x 11" SIGNED PHOTO OF ONE OF THE CREATURES - The download will be sent to you one day after it's theatrical release! The photo will be signed by Tom and I. PLUS: Everything listed above.
(ADD ON) T-SHIRT ONLY- For those of you who just want the (regular) $50 T-shirt showing ADI artwork on the front, here it is! *(Separate from prize bundle offers.)
'HARBINGER DOWN' SOUNDTRACK DIGITAL DOWNLOAD- PLUS: Everything listed above.
(ADD ON) LIMITED EDITION BLU-RAY/DVD WHICH WILL INCLUDE EXCLUSIVE SUPPLEMENTAL MATERIAL- The BTS alone, will be about as long as the entire film! *(Separate from prize bundle offers.)
(ADD ON): SEE YOUR NAME ON THE BIG SCREEN!- Screen credit on Harbinger Down for all who pledge and extra $40 as an 'add on' OR, purchase this as a single prize! Thank you Harbies. Let's get er DOWN!
LIMITED EDITION NUMBERED, 'HARBINGER DOWN' MOVIE POSTER- This poster will be available ONLY during this campaign, specifically for you. PLUS: Everything listed above.

T-SHIRT showing ADI artwork on the front- Please specify adult size: SM, MED, LG, XL or XXL. PLUS: the movie soundtrack DD, DD of the film, signed photo, shooting script PDF, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

CREW T-SHIRT (LIMITED EDITION)- Please specify adult size: SM, MED, LG, XL or XXL. PLUS: the limited edition numbered movie poster, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed print, shooting script PDF, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.
YOUR LIMITED EDITION NUMBERED POSTER SIGNED BY ENTIRE CAST (and Tom and I). PLUS: everything listed above.
LIMITED EDITION BLU-RAY/DVD WHICH WILL INCLUDE EXCLUSIVE SUPPLEMENTAL MATERIAL- The BTS alone, will be about as long as the entire film! PLUS: Everything listed above.
COPY OF THE SCRIPT PERSONALLY ADDRESSED TO YOU/SIGNED, OR SIGNED BY THE ENTIRE CAST (and Tom and I).

PLUS: the limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/ limited numbered and signed movie poster/ T-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

(ADD ON) SCREEN USED COLLECTIBLE MYSTERY GRAB BAG!- We'll pluck a piece of dressing off a set wall or scoop up a prop, wrap it up and send it to you! We'll also give you a letter of authenticy from Tom and I verifying that your item is truly screen used. *Shipping not included outside of the U.S.

A 60 MIN. TOUR OF ADI (up to 2 people)- Get a meet n greet with Tom/and or myself in our creature workshop! 
PLUS: Everything listed above.
LANCE HENRIKSEN WILL RECORD A PERSONAL (up to 25 seconds) AUDIO MESSAGE TO YOU (within reason, of course)-

PLUS: the limited edition Blu-ray/DVD, signed limited edition numbered poster, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, shooting script PDF, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

2 TICKETS TO OUR L.A. PREMIERE AND THE AFTER PARTY!- Come hang out with Lance, Tom and I plus the rest of the cast and crew. Photo ops for sure!   
PLUS: the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

LIMITED EDITION COLLECTIBLE CREATURE SCULPTURE approx. 8" tall maquette created by an ADI artist. None will be made after this campaign. PLUS: the limited edition signed and numbered movie poster/ T-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.
PERSONAL (up to 35 seconds) VIDEO FROM LANCE, ALEC, TOM OR ANY PRINCIPAL CAST MEMBER OF YOUR CHOICE!

PLUS: 2 tickets to the premiere and after party, the signed script, the limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

ADI TOUR FOR YOU AND A GUEST! See our monster factory and get a meet n greet with Tom/and or myself!   PLUS: 2 tickets to the premiere and after party, signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ limited edition t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, production diary and private BTS footage.
A TOP ADI ARTIST WILL SKETCH YOUR LIKENESS BEING TRANSFORMED INTO A FREAKY CREATURE - You will get the original 10" by 12" signed sketch, of course.

PLUS, 2 ticket's to the premiere and after party, 2 tickets for the ADI tour, meet n greet, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, production diary and private BTS footage.

PLASTER FACE CAST (market value: $1,500)-  Ages 15 and up and not claustrophobic, please! Parent or legal guardian required for ages 15-18.
PLUS, 2 tickets to the premiere and after party, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

BUY THE PANTS (ENTIRE COSTUME, ACTUALLY) OFF LANCE!- Lance Henriksen's costume, signed and with a letter of authenticity from Tom and I. Lance might die a horrible death so be prepared. These too might be soaked in blood! PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 2 people), meet n greet, 2 premiere and after party tickets, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage. *Shipping not included

PLASTER FRONT HALF BODY CAST (from the waist up (face included, if you like). Market value: $4,000)- And when we're done, you can take your body home with you, no need to ship! Ages 15 and up and not claustrophobic, please! Parent or legal guardian required for ages 15-18. PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 2 people), meet n greet, 2 premiere and after party tickets, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

THE DIRECTOR'S PACKAGE-You will get my personal shooting script with notes (signed by the entire cast, Tom and I), original/signed creature sketches and my personal set of storyboards with notes (who knows what else you'll find in there)! PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 3 people), meet n greet, 2 premiere and after party tickets, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

JOIN THE ADI DESIGN TEAM AND GET CREDIT!- Ever wish you could help design a creature for a movie? This prize allows you to be part of the ADI/HARBINGER DOWN Design Team. Design input sessions will be in 3 skyped phases: Concept, Sculpture, Painting. We reserve the right to quality control just in case you need some 'help'. PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 3 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

THREE MORE TO JOIN THE ADI DESIGN TEAM AND GET CREDIT!- Ever wish you could help design a creature for a movie? This prize allows you to be part of the ADI/HARBINGER DOWN Design Team. Design input sessions will be in 3 skyped phases: Concept, Sculpture, Painting. We reserve the right to quality control just in case you need some 'help'. PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 3 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

OWN AN ENTIRE (SMALL) SCREEN-USED CREATURE FROM THE FILM!- Wish you owned the Chestburster from ALIEN? That sold for $30,000 bucks! Do you have 30 G's? No? Then you should get the creature from HD! Who knows how much it's value will increase once the film is released!

PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 4 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

ASSOCIATE PRODUCER CREDIT AND PERKS - Spend the day with us on set and have lunch with Lance, Tom and I plus the rest of the cast! PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 5 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

A PRIVATE SCREENING OF MONSTER SQUAD WITH GILLMAN HIMSELF, TOM WOODRUFF JR.!- Bring a friend out to studioADI and watch Monster Squad with Tom. Hear unique perspectives and behind the scenes secrets from Tom as you enjoy a personal live commentary on the film. Lunch or dinner's on us! PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 5 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

A PRIVATE SCREENING OF STARSHIP TROOPERS WITH ALEC GILLIS- Bring a friend out to studioADI and watch Starship Troopers with me. I will provide live commentary about the joys (and challenges) of working on this exciting Science Fiction adventure. Lunch or dinner's on us! PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 5 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

A CHARACTER IN THE MOVIE WILL BE NAMED AFTER YOU (first and last name)!- We can have up to 3 male and 2 female names. Legit names only please. PLUS, the ADI tour (up to 5 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

YOUR INDIVIDUAL PHOTOGRAPH WILL BE FEATURED IN THE FILM!- We'll work your photo into the set dressing of a scene, and you will get on screen credit as well!  PLUS: the ADI tour of the monster shop (up to 6 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.
YOUR FAMILY PHOTOGRAPH WILL FEATURED IN THE FILM!- We think your beautiful family would make wonderful set dressing, and each of you will get on screen credits, as well!

PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 6 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

PRIVATE SCREENING OF THE ADI FILM OF YOUR CHOICE WITH TOM WOODRUFF JR. AND ALEC GILLIS-  Bring a friend out to studioADI and watch the ADI film of your choice with Tom and me. We will provide live commentary about our experiences on the film you choose. Visit www.studioadi.com for a full filmography. Afterwards, lunch or dinner's on us! PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 7 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

OWN AN ENTIRE (MEDIUM) SCREEN USED CREATURE FROM THE FILM!- Remember the Dog-Thing in Carpenter's THE THING? About that size (if not slightly larger). 
PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 7 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.

YOUR BUSINESS WILL BE MENTIONED IN THE FILM- You've helped us, let us help you promote your business! Again, must be a legit name, but we'll show it written or have it spoken in the film. Plus, you'll get an on screen credit as well!

PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 9 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.
YOU OWN AN ENTIRE (LARGE, MAN SIZED) SCREEN-USED CREATURE FROM THE FILM!- Get rid of that treadmill and make room for this bad boy! Don't be surprised if this goes up in value too.

PLUS: the ADI tour (up to 9 people), meet n greet, 2 tickets to the premiere/after party, the signed script, limited edition Blu-ray/DVD/signed numbered movie poster/ t-shirt, shooting script PDF, DD of film, movie soundtrack DD, signed photo, digital copy of artwork, our production diary and private BTS footage.
